message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.IR. 

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques for classifying the attitude expressed in a text, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also uses deep learning models such as LSTM and bidirectional encoding, which are commonly used in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG) research. Additionally, the paper deals with information retrieval (cs.IR) as it involves identifying relevant information from a text. Finally, the paper also deals with social media analysis (cs.SI) as it uses Twitter data for evaluation.
